message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm asking $1500000 for it, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $1200000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to come down to $1350000.  This takes into account the value you've expressed and keeps things moving forward.  What do you think?
I appreciate the willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $1250000?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1250000 is still a little below what I need to make this deal work.  How about $1300000? This is a good compromise, and it allows us to finalize this transaction.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $1275000?
